message: Hello Bob, thank you for your interest in my product.  I'm confident it will be incredibly valuable for you.  To start negotiations, I'm proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the significant value it brings.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of your product, I would like to propose a lower price of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, however, the price of $950,000 significantly undervalues the true worth of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This reflects the considerable value it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000. I hope this is within the range you're comfortable with.
